definition: acquisition of property by descent or by will
details:
noun
- acquisition of property by descent or by will
= synonyms: taking over
- the action of following in order
= synonyms: sequence
- a following of one thing after another in time
= synonyms: sequence, chronological sequence, successiveness, chronological succession
- a group of people or things arranged or following in order
= example: a group of people or things arranged or following in order
- (ecology) the gradual and orderly process of change in an ecosystem brought about by the progressive replacement of one community by another until a stable climax is established
= synonyms: ecological succession
